mapper.sql: a.id, a.auditId, a.userId, a.`name`, a.mobile, a.money, a.payment, a.remak, a.validity_date, a.create_by, a.create_date, a.del_flag, c.title, c.bengtime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM train_live_user a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.userId=b.id LEFT JOIN train_live_audit c ON a.auditId=c.id WHERE a.id=#{id}

SELECT o.name AS 'organization', d.label as "position",
FROM train_live_user a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.userId=b.id LEFT JOIN train_live_audit c ON a.auditId=c.id LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = b.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict d ON d.value = b.user_type AND d.type = 'sys_user_type' WHERE a.del_flag=0
AND a.auditId=#{auditId}
AND a.name like '%'||#{name}||'%' CONCAT('%',#{name}, '%')
AND a.mobile like '%'||#{mobile}||'%' CONCAT('%',#{mobile}, '%')
AND c.title like '%'||#{title}||'%' CONCAT('%',#{title}, '%')
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE train_live_user SET auditId=#{auditId}, money=#{money}, payment=#{payment}, validity_date=#{validityDate}, remak=#{remak} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO train_live_user ( auditId, userId, `name`, mobile, money, payment, remak, validity_date, create_by, create_date ) VALUES ( #{auditId}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{money}, #{payment}, #{remak}, #{validityDate}, #{createBy.name}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(a.userId) as "userId" FROM train_live_user a WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.auditId=#{auditId}
SELECT a.user_id FROM train_live_reminds a WHERE a.`status` = 0 AND a.audit_id=#{auditId}
SELECT uc.client_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_live_reminds a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_oa_user_client uc ON uc.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.status = 0 AND a.audit_id=#{auditId} AND uc.client_id is not null
SELECT c.name FROM mtmydb.mtmy_live_reminds a LEFT JOIN train_live_audit c ON c.id = a.audit_id WHERE a.audit_id = #{auditId} AND a.status = 0 AND c.del_flag = 0
